body:
### About
Shopper is a really simple android application. It is just a list to manage current items you have to buy. Indeed, everyone can use it its own way.

The aim of the project is to keep it really simple. The principal functionality is sharing, because it is really useful :-)

Application can be found on Google Play [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.remifayolle.android.shopper).

### Project is host on [GitHub](http://github.com)
You will find here some information about the application development.

Feel free to contribute :
- create, review and comment [issues](https://github.com/buzeeg/shopper/issues)
- [fork](https://github.com/buzeeg/shopper/fork) my code and deliver some fixes using [Pull Requests](https://github.com/buzeeg/shopper/pull/new/master)
name: Shopper
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
